mapper.update: update schedule_board set scb_title=#{scb_title}, scb_from=#{scb_from}, scb_via=#{scb_via}, scb_to=#{scb_to}, scb_sdate=#{scb_sdate}, scb_content=#{scb_content} where scb_num = #{scb_num}
mapper.select: select scb_num, scb_mem_num, scb_from,scb_via,scb_to, scb_sdate,scb_title, scb_content,scb_wdate,scb_case from schedule_board where scb_from=(select airport_num from AIRPORT_INFO where name_kr=#{scb_from}) and scb_to in (select airport_num from AIRPORT_INFO where COUNTRY_KR=#{scb_to}) and scb_sdate between to_date(#{min},'YYYY-MM-DD:HH24:MI') and to_date(#{max},'YYYY-MM-DD:HH24:MI') order by scb_num desc
